name: Raiju
description: Raijin marks a target enemy by dismissing his ally Raiju, who hides in the enemy's navel. While asleep, Raiju slows and reveals the target to Raijin's team on the minimap. The next time Raijin damages the target, Raiju awakens and claws his way out, doubling the slow and damaging the target and 5 nearby enemies every .5s for 2.5s in his attempt to flee. Subsequent enemies hit take decreased damage.
stats: Damage Pet Tick: 15/25/35/45/55 (+13% of your magical power)
Bounce Damage Pet Tick: 14/23/32/41/50 (+10% of your magical power)
